backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor and a large set of public types for media, users, ads, wallets, referrals, approvals, and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a placeholder migration module with a run function that returns an empty upgraded actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and styles for light and dark themes using custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, theme provider, layout, and all public and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Renders a clickable banner ad, tracking views and clicks using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCapab: Renders an alert box showing availability, empty state, or error messages with corresponding icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with a styled card and a button returning users to the homepage.
Guards admin routes by showing a loading screen during admin checks and redirecting non‑authorized users to an access‑denied view.
frontend/src/components/AdSidebar.tsx: Displays up to three sidebar ads and tracks impressions and clicks for each.
Displays a grid of category cards and navigates to the selected category when clicked.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoomComponen: Implements a chat UI with message polling, file attachments, and sending messages to a chat room.
frontend/src/components/ContentCard.tsx: Renders a media preview card showing type, title, stats, and duration with hover actions.
frontend/src/components/ContentGrid.tsx: Loads all content, displays it in tabbed grids, and opens a player when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/ContentPlayer.ts: Shows a modal media player supporting video, audio, and rating interaction.
frontend/src/components/DisplayScreen.ts: Displays the currently active content with video playback and metadata if available.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, and login for admin access.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, search, authentication controls, and admin routing logic.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with animations, marketing text, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx: Implements an interactive assistant widget with chat, voice input, speech synthesis, and persistent user memory.
frontend/src/components/JitsiMeetIntegra: Integrates Jitsi Meet for starting, managing, and interacting with video conferences.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with header, footer, route background logic, and conditional HeroHelper rendering.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a modal for initial profile setup with a simple name form and simulated submission.
frontend/src/components/SharedPlaybackCo: Shows a shared playback UI with placeholder content and play/pause state handling.
frontend/src/components/VersionBadge.tsx: Returns null to hide version information from the UI.
frontend/src/components/VideoCallCompone: A UI card showing a mock video call interface with mute, video toggle, and end-call actions.
frontend/src/components/WAN22Integration: A form-driven UI for simulating WAN 2.2 content generation, including project inputs and status handling.
frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts: Defines admin navigation items, section order, and route mappings for the admin interface.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports an empty application version constant.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
Derives boolean capability flags from the backend actor for admin feature access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin and exposes admin UI eligibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including user profiles, admin actions, approvals, ads, content, and more.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, color themes, typography, layout rules, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAdsPage.tsx: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, deleting, and toggling ads, with capability checks and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAffiliatePage.ts: Admin page to view and create affiliate tiers, including a dialog form and table listing.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApprovalPage.tsx: Aggregates and displays all pending approval items across multiple categories, allowing admins to approve or reject them.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentPage.tsx: Admin interface to upload, list, and delete media content with form inputs and upload progress.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDisplayPage.tsx: Displays current screen content and provides a form to submit new display content.
Provides admin tools to review, approve, reject, search, and delete various content, ads, and categories.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHiiYahChatPage.t: Lets admins review and approve or reject broadcast and hero join requests.
frontend/src/pages/AdminImageLibraryPage: Handles image upload, approval, rejection, and bulk deletion for the platform’s image library.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteAcceptPage: Processes admin invite tokens, manages II login flow, and redeems invitations before redirecting.
Fetches, displays, and generates admin invite codes with copy-to-clipboard support using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMallPage.tsx: Provides CRUD management for mall items including creation, editing, deletion, and summary stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMediaUploadRoomP: Allows admins to upload media content, track upload progress, and view categorized media items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMemberDirectoryP: Lists and filters user profiles for admins, with capability checks and search/filter controls.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPriceControlRoom: Admin interface for editing subscription, content, and mall-related pricing with save actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPricingTermsPage: Admin UI for editing pricing and terms, loading active terms, and saving updates with validation and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoomsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of admin sections and navigates to selected admin routes using predefined nav items.
frontend/src/pages/AdminWalletManagement: Mock wallet monitoring dashboard showing BTC metrics, seed visibility toggling, and clipboard actions.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard to generate, view, and copy referral links, and display tier and activity metrics.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays media content for a category, allowing users to open items in a content player.
frontend/src/pages/CreditCardPage.tsx: Displays a mock Excalibur credit card interface with balance input and login gating.
Provides a studio workspace UI with hero section, tabs, and integrations for Jitsi Meet and WAN 2.2 AI tools.
frontend/src/pages/FlixiodTestPage.tsx: Test page for Flixiod streaming with an embedded player, banner, and option to open the site in a new tab.
frontend/src/pages/HiiYahChatPage.tsx: Authenticated chat hub featuring Rocket.Chat‑based messaging, video calls, playback, and connection-code UI placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page with hero section, global streaming overview, featured content categories, and financial services showcase.
frontend/src/pages/IHeartRadioTestPage.t: Test page for iHeartRadio streaming with embedded player, banner, and external‑link launch.
frontend/src/pages/MallPage.tsx: Mall landing page with branding, search input, and a placeholder card indicating the shopping feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Renders a signup form with validation and a simulated submission flow, showing a confirmation screen after success.
frontend/src/pages/StreamingPartnersPage: Displays a grid of streaming partner platforms with icons and buttons for testing or opening each service.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active terms and conditions with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Manages wallet creation and viewing states, including authentication checks, loading, and display of wallet details.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Provides extended TypeScript interfaces mirroring expected backend structures for media, users, wallets, and related entities.
frontend/src/utils/adminNavScroll.ts: Utility to navigate to an admin route and scroll to the top after navigation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for persisting, retrieving, and clearing invite tokens and other secret URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, shadows, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s build state, tracking admin-focused feature fixes, known issues, and pending requests for login, approvals, editing, uploads, responsiveness, and theming.
